channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-16411] Fix javadoc warnings in hadoop-dynamometer
item.description: "mvn package -Pdist" failed due to javadoc warnings.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:

There are javadoc warnings in other subprojects of hadoop-dynamometer. I will fix them too and address checkstyle warnings in the next patch.

This message was automatically generated.
Dynamometer adds checkstyle and findbugs issues to the build reports too...they should have a separate JIRA, maybe assign to the original authors to encourage them to correct this
I filed HADOOP-16418 for checkstyle and findbugs warnings. I would like to fix javadoc warnings at first here since it affects -Pdist build. 002 is the updated patch.

Interesting... We got a clean Jenkins report for Javadoc (and findbugs) on the initial patch. Thanks for reporting this iwasakims and for working on it. I'll take HADOOP-16418.

+1 from me on v002 patch. I see Yetus voted -1 on the unit test, but when I click through to the test report, it seems that all of the tests passed.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #16871 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/16871/)
